Articles.Content:
I believe I have all the tools. SAS, ASAS, a MechJeb copy of Jebediah Kerman\'s pilot brain, all manners of thrusters, RCS devices, helicopter parts, robotics components...it\'s all here. BUT! I can\'t appear to make it work.

All I want is a vehicle capable of hovering over a position, at a precise altitude, without needing constant readjustments.

How would one go about making and operating one?

Any rumours of this leading to a weaponisation of kerrestial debris disposal are baseless slander.
Operationally, MechJeb\'s Translatron can keep you motionless in the air. Using the 'Keep Vert' setting with a speed of 0 and the 'Kill H/S' box selected will do it.

That sounds wonderful and I will try it right away and I will be forever in your debt, good sir.

Let\'s see if I can build something it works with ???

Hm. It does not. What kinds of vessels does this Translatron work with?

Rockets? Planes? Helicopters?

EDIT: Nevermind. I am an idiot.

EDIT2: Scratch that, too. Everything is idiots. Sometimes it works, sometimes it does not. Pah.
